metadata.title: CiscoUmbrella-AddIpToDestinationList
metadata.description: This playbook showcases an example of triggering an incident within a targeted Teams channel and opening up a ticket within Service Now. Additionally The playbook will also list playbooks that can be initiated from teams using an adaptive card and callbacks that will take action upon certain entities identified in the incident.
prerequisites: 1. ServiceNow Instance URL, Username, and password.
2. Access and authorization to enable API connectors
3. Teams Group ID, Channel ID and Alert details where the messages are to be posted in.

metadata.description: Id of the Teams Group where the adaptive card will be posted.
Id of the Teams Channel where the adaptive card will be posted.

inputs.name: action_message
inputs.value: IP @{outputs('Get_IP')} was not added to "" destination lists due to Csico Umbrella API error.

body.text: For more details check the incident:
Select the Cisco Umbrella destination list to add IP @{item()['address']} to.

choices.title: Closed: Benign Positive - suspicious but expected
Closed: False Positive - incorrect alert logic

inputs.name: status_message
inputs.value: Incident status was changed to "Closed: True Positive - suspicious activity".

inputs.name: status_message
inputs.value: Incident status was changed to "Closed: Benign Positive - suspicious but expected".

inputs.name: status_message
inputs.value: Incident status was changed to "Closed: False Positive - incorrect alert logic".

inputs.name: status_message
inputs.value: Incident status was changed to "Closed: False Positive - inaccurate data".

inputs.name: status_message
inputs.value: Incident status was changed to "Closed: Undetermined".
